name: SOULCHAIN
description:
Made for Game Jam de Mentirinha

Use the chain that binds you to your soul to find your way out of the underworld!

How to play:

Move - WASD, Arrow Keys, or Controller Left Stick

Jump - Spacebar or Controller A

Hook - H or Controller X

Quick Restart - R or Controller Back

Menu - Esc or Controller Start

Credits:

Programming + Art - @moraguma

BG Art - @amorahere

Extra Art - @deesinterade

Music from SNES Original Soundtrack Small Collection by Juliano Zucareli [ozuka music]

SFX from 8-bit SFX pack by beepyeah

BitPotion font by Joeb Rogers

Thank you for playing! Feel free to talk to me on Twitter  if you wanna give some feedback. I really appreciate it!
